column1: # The gauge moved to Shaw Paddock for the period April 1882 - April 1889.
# In September 1993 the gauge moved to South Lunds School House.
# The reading for September 1893 is an estimate and has been omitted.
# Monthly values may be unreliable due to the gauge only being read on Sundays.
# Annual totals should be less affected by this feature.
